task.title: Reviewing a Snapshot of Data
task.shortdesc: You can review a snapshot of data that passes through the pipeline. When you request a snapshot, the takes a snapshot of the data being processed. You can then review the snapshot stage by stage or through a set of stages, like data preview.

context.p: Review a snapshot of data to verify how the pipeline processes data. In the Monitor panel, you can drill down to review the values of each record to determine if the stage or stages transforms data as expected.

step.cmd: From the pipeline canvas of a running pipeline, click Snapshot.
step.stepresult: The canvas centers on the origin stage of the pipeline. The Monitor panel displays snapshot data in the Output Data column. Since this is the origin of the pipeline, no input data displays.

step.cmd: To preview multiple stages, click Snapshot Between Multiple Stages .
step.info:
The Preview panel displays two lists of stages.
From the First list, select the first stage to include.
In the Last list, select the last stage to include.

step.cmd: To exit the snapshot review and return to the default Monitor mode, click Close Snapshot.
